Articles.Content:
The BluPlanet Space Agency presents you its very first rover, the MDU. The Mobile Deployment Unit features a huge carrier vehicle designed to traverse a long distance. Once it nears your desired destination, decouple the buggy, extend the ladders at the rear, and EVA your driver. He can now board the MDU Buggy. Notes: Translation controls highly recommended by the BPA. It is unsafe to turn the buggy while moving over 8 m/s, and doing so will void the BluPlanet Rover Warranty. The warranty is also void if driven by Jebediah Kerman. CREDIT: All credit goes to Lordhullo for his work on this rover.

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/wxz9igupoq4vnkd/M_D_U%20Mk_1.craft

Again, made by lordhullo, not me.
